title: Tracks API: list tracks by album
description: Add GET /albums/{id}/tracks (and optional /tracks?albumId=) returning track DTOs with nested artist/album info.
notes: Implemented GET /albums/{id}/tracks and /tracks?albumId=... returning track DTOs with nested artist/album summaries; updated queries, mappers, swagger.

title: Allow CORS for all origins
description: Add middleware to permit any-origin CORS responses (temporary default allow-all).
notes: Added allow-all CORS middleware at router level; allows any origin/headers/methods and 204 for OPTIONS. Tests skipped due to sandbox cache permissions.

title: Add year to album
description: Introduce year metadata on albums (schema, API DTOs, handlers)

title: Verify playlist positions stay contiguous and zero-based
description: Manually test add/move/delete/enqueue flows to ensure playlist positions are 0..n-1 without duplicates or gaps; note any regressions.

title: Investigate stuck folder scans (unmounted volume and Downloads both show running)
description: Folders: /Volumes/SAMSUNG/MUSIC (unmounted) and ~/Downloads both report last_scan_status=running with last_scan_at 2025-12-17T19:02:0xZ. Determine why scans appear stuck or not resetting when volume is unavailable, and ensure scanner/DB status updates correctly.

title: Trim nested summary payload fields if responses grow too large
description: Monitor payload size for nested artist/album summaries in responses and consider limiting fields or adding sparse field support if size becomes an issue.

title: Add settings CRUD API and metadata keys endpoint
description: Add settings table migration and CRUD endpoints, plus a hard-coded endpoint listing allowed settings keys and descriptions.

title: Add tests for track expand defaults and align clients
description: Add automated coverage for expand default behavior on track endpoints and make sure any clients relying on implicit album/artist payloads are updated.

title: Merge multipart albums
description: Handle album variants like 'Lost Dogs [CD1]' or 'Lost Dogs - Part 1' by merging into a single library album entry (design/implementation TBD).

title: Implement Logseq repeating tasks
description: Add repeating task support per Logseq semantics; clarify how repeats are encoded and handled.

title: Reset SQLite after artist/album schema changes
description: Create-only migrations required deleting the old SQLite DB so the new artist/album schema applied cleanly.

title: Backfill libraries after dropping DB for track title fixes
description: Plan migration/backfill approach if we drop/recreate SQLite to pick up track title changes; document how to rescan libraries to restore data.

title: Populate artist/album/genre/year during scan
description: Ensure sqlc models/queries and scanner write artist, album, genre, and year tags to the new schema during scans.

title: Add logseq property tags to journal entries
description: Added Logseq key:: value property parsing to journal entry and journal tag extraction.

title: Tighten CORS allowlist once frontend hosts are known
description: Current middleware allows all origins/headers/methods; narrow allowlist once frontend deployment hosts are defined.

title: Add metals prices endpoint
description: Add endpoint that fetches current gold (XAU) and silver (XAG) prices from gold-api.com and returns {gold, silver}.

title: Add tasks tables and transitions
Adjust journal entries date filter to use journal_date/scheduled/deadline
description: Added journal_date and updated journal entries date filter to use a single LIKE pattern across journal/scheduled/deadline dates; regenerated sqlc outputs.

title: Handle multi-artist albums during sync
description: Investigate album grouping when files list more than one artist. Current sync splits into multiple album records; need a plan so multi-artist albums stay single with correct artist handling.
notes: Follow-up migrated from docs/changes/2025-12-17-multi-artist-albums.md (design/implementation for multi-artist album handling during sync).

title: Normalize prefix searches for startswith queries
description: Add case/diacritic folding (spacefold or similar) or broader search normalization for artists/albums/tracks prefix filters if user-facing search needs it.

title: Update Swagger docs to OpenAPI 3
description: Upgrade generated API docs and tooling from Swagger 2.0 to OpenAPI 3, update generator config, regenerate swagger assets.
notes: Decision: keep Swagger 2.0 for now; no tooling change.

title: Add pagination and filters to track listing endpoints
description: Add pagination/search filters (artistId, playlistId, search, etc.) to GET /tracks and album track listings when they are used for broader browsing/search.

title: Prune orphaned artists/albums
description: Decide and implement cleanup of artist/album rows when no tracks reference them, balancing soft-deletes and availability rules.

title: Add journals endpoints and metadata table
description: Add journals table/migration, list and day endpoints backed by Journals Folder setting, with hash/size/tag tracking.

title: StartsWith filter for albums/artists/tracks
description: Add startswith query param to list endpoints (albums, artists, tracks) using prefix search; add indexes as needed for performance and update swagger.
notes: Added startswith prefix filters to list endpoints (artists, albums, tracks incl album tracks) with supporting indexes and swagger updates; expand behavior unchanged.

title: Track list fields/expand support
description: Add fields and expand query params to GET /albums/{id}/tracks and GET /tracks, with shared implementation, allowlist expand (album,artist), sparse fieldsets, and swagger updates.
notes: Implemented expand=album,artist on track list endpoints; removed fields filtering per request. Defaults keep nested album/artist; expand controls whether they are populated and whether joins run.

title: Add sqlc queries for tasks
description: Define queries for tasks and task transitions (CRUD + status history) in db/query and regenerate sqlc.

title: Return nested artist/album info in responses
description: Expose nested artist info on albums and nested artist/album on tracks (including playlist track payloads) with names for clarity.
notes: Added nested artist info to album responses and nested artist/album summaries to track payloads (including playlists); regenerated swagger.

title: Add task handlers and DTOs
description: Implement HTTP handlers and API DTOs for tasks and transitions, keeping sqlc null types out of responses and adding Swagger annotations.

title: Refactor notes/tasks into journal entries endpoints
description: Refactor notes/tasks into unified /journals/entries endpoints; update DTOs/queries/routes, calendar output, and swagger docs.
